text: Chi-Chi is a fictional character created by Akira Toriyama. She is the wife of Son Goku, the main character in the Dragon Ball series. She is also the mother of Son Gohan and Son Goten She's made various apparitions in videogames. Chi- chi was first introduced in Dragon Ball, chapter 11: "...And into the Fire!" ( From the Weekly Sh≈çnen Jump 1985) On the 15th episode of the Piccolo Jr. Saga, Goku Would promise to marry her, and they would finally do so after he defeated Piccolo in the 32n World Martial Arts Tournament. Category:Dragon Ball characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1985
title: Chichi
